{"id":1231210140,"question_id":3379,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1713018787,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1231210140/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Score of a String","memory":"42.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int scoreOfString(String s) {\n        \n        char[] arr = s.toCharArray();\n        \n        int res = 0; \n        \n        for(int i=0; i<s.length()-1; i++){\n            char a = arr[i];\n            char b = arr[i+1];\n            res+= Math.abs(a-b) ;\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"score-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
